action.content: Turn 0

You are playing a text adventure game. I will describe what you can perceive in the game. You write the single action you want to take in the game starting with >. Only reply with an action.
For example:
> open cupboard

You can have up to two objects in your inventory at the same time.

Your goal for this game is: Put the apple in the freezer, the plate on the side table and the mop on the shelf.

Once you have achieved your goal, write "> done" to end the game.

You are in a living room now. There are a book, a couch, a chair and a table. The book is on the table. There are passages to a bedroom and a kitchen here.
> take book
Turn 1
You take the book. In your inventory you have a book.
> go to kitchen
Turn 2
You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter, a cupboard and a refrigerator. The cupboard is closed. The refrigerator is closed. There are passages to a pantry, a living room and a hallway here.
> open cupboard
Turn 3
The cupboard is now open. In the cupboard there is a plate.
> take plate
Turn 4
You take the plate. In your inventory you have a plate and a book.
> go to living room
Turn 5
You are in a living room now. There are a couch, a chair and a table. There are passages to a bedroom and a kitchen here.
> put book on table
Turn 6
You put the book on the table.
> go to kitchen
Turn 7
You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter, a cupboard and a refrigerator. The cupboard is open. The refrigerator is closed. There are passages to a pantry, a living room and a hallway here.
> go to pantry
Turn 8

> open freezer
Turn 9

> go to kitchen
Turn 10
You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter, a cupboard and a refrigerator. The cupboard is open. The refrigerator is closed. There are passages to a pantry, a living room and a hallway here.

> go to broom closet
Turn 12
You are in a broom closet now. There are a broom and a mop. The broom is on the floor. The mop is on the floor. There is a passage to a hallway here.
> take mop
Turn 13
You take the mop. In your inventory you have a mop and a plate.

> drop plate
> go to living room

> go to living room
